name: SeaSnap
description:
Synopsis

SeaSnap is an underwater adventure collect-athon game. With your submarine and camera equipped, you are required to research a body of alien murky waters. Dive into the depths, record all objects and creatures, and upgrade your gear to allow you to reach the looming abyss below.

Controls

WASD = Move / Mouse = Aim

Right Click = Camera / Left Click = Take Picture

Tab = Journal

Esc / Enter = Pause / Return to Submarine

Thanks for Playing!

Cral.
